mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Clarysville Hospital. Civil War Records of Samuel West, Physician
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Patient Record for Cavanaugh, John
mdRecord.dcterms:spatial: Salma, Clark Co., Ohio [Selma, Clark County, Ohio]
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Patient Name: Cavanaugh, John Patient Age: 31. Marital Status: Single. Diagnosis: On furlough from Howard Hosp [Hospital] Washington City - convalescent and waiting for transportation. Wounded - ball passing 1 inch above and to the right of coccyx bone wound still discharging puss . Location Wounded: In action Wilderness. Date Wounded: 1864/05/06. Nature of Wound: Bullet. Result: Returned to duty .
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Cavanaugh, John
